name: NCS E-Giving Custom Payment Platform
author: Ankit Gupta

sections.description: A WordPress plugin that encapsulates the NCS e-Giving platform for use in client WordPress based websites. This plugin will provide e-giving capabilities for anonymous users as well as users with an e-giving account with NCS. Authenticated users may manage some aspects of their e-giving account, schedule offerings, etc.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_action('plugin_name_hook'); ?> in your templates
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release of plug-in.

  • Changed admin setting names and overall name of plugin

short_description: A WordPress plugin that encapsulates the NCS e-Giving platform for use in client WordPress based websites.
description: A WordPress plugin that encapsulates the NCS e-Giving platform for use in client WordPress based websites. This plugin will provide e-giving capabilities for anonymous users as well as users with an e-giving account with NCS. Authenticated users may manage some aspects of their e-giving account, schedule offerings, etc.

upgrade_notice: This plugin is built in 3.9 version of Wordpress. It has been tested in the same. If the plugin is to used in different sites than its CSS needs to be updated.
upgrade_notice.1.01: This version changes setting names and plugin name.
